duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the implementation of Workday as the HCM platform under the nxtgenERP program
Assist in documenting end-to-end processes and appropriate controls for HR workflows and application landscape
Identify and develop processes for complying with manual controls where necessary
Serve as the main point of contact for all HR audit requests and assist in gathering data for audit compliance
Identify and document sensitive access and segregation of duties risks in HR processes and develop mitigating controls
Perform quarterly sensitive access and segregation of duties (SOD) analysis and change monitoring
Participate in Workday Change Advisory Board (CAB) and advise on controls related changes and testing requirements

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in HR, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
